content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace setup at position (1, 1) and (3, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (1, 1) which is currently working and has 4 iron ore as input and produces iron plates.
- Stone furnace at position (3, 0) which has no ingredients to smelt.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has the required ingredients before attempting to insert items. Check the inventory of the furnace to confirm it can accept the input.

### Errors when extracting from furnaces
- Make sure to extract from furnaces that have produced items. If the furnace is empty or has no ingredients, extraction will not yield any results.
